text: It's a picture from when I had tea with Haruki-chan.

It was the first shop we went to,
but it was really good, wasn't itï½ž

Oh, really?
Which one is it?

Looks like the two of
had a lot of fun.

What sort of things
did you talk about?

Uhm... it was a seasonal...
what was it again?

Ahah, we were so lost in conversation
that I totally forgot what we ate...!

Wwant to join us next time, Producer?
Let's go and have girl-talk together.

We talked about lessons, our hometowns,
and about our producer.

Fufu,
there was so much to talk about, the time flew by.
